title: Steven de Jongh Loves the Challenge of Directing a Top WorldTour Team | Bobby & Jens
content:
The Lidl-Trek DS talks team directing, keeping fit, and how he would have approached Jumbo-Visma's leadership problem at the Vuelta.

Read the full article at Steven de Jongh Loves the Challenge of Directing a Top WorldTour Team | Bobby & Jens on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
